title: #ICYMI - Sneakerheads and Sneaker Design
description:
In case you missed this episode on the Playing with Science channel… Chuck Nice and Gary O’Reilly explore the world of sneakerheads and the science of sneaker design with legendary designer D’Wayne Edwards, designer/creator Federico Maccapani aka @Mbroidered, and sneaker fashionista Ezra Wine.

Photo Credit: StarTalk©.
author: feed@startalkradio.net (Neil deGrasse Tyson)
